consistently outperforms.from sentence: shows that our multi-step model consistently outperforms the single - step model on the dev set of all four datasets in terms of accuracy .

SciTail dataset.from sentence: For example , on SciTail dataset , SAN outperforms the single - step model by .

SAN 's result.from sentence: In particular , on the most challenging " Long Sentence " and " Quantity / Time " categories , SAN 's result is substantially better than previous systems .

SciTail dataset.from sentence: On SciTail dataset , SAN even outperforms GPT .

proposed model.from sentence: Comparing with Single - step baseline , the proposed model obtains + 2.8 improvement on the Sc - iTail test set ( 94.0 vs 91.2 ) and + 2.1 improvement on the SciTail dev set ( 96.1 vs 93.9 ) .

biggest improvement.from sentence: Comparing with Chen 's model , the biggest improvement of SAN ( 50 % vs 77 % and 58 % vs 85 % on Matched and Mismatched settings respectively ) is on the " Antonym " category .

Our model.from sentence: Our model outperforms the best system in RepEval 2017 inmost cases , except on " Conditional " and " Tense Difference " categories .

SAN.from sentence: We also find that SAN works extremely well on " Active / Passive " and " Paraphrase " categories .
